name: circuitbreaker
description: This is a transreality, mobile-first game where players capture and verify benchmarked tasks. Using mobile devices, individuals and/or teams compete to be the first to complete a randomized list of activities, which may include one, or a mixture of the following tasks: taking a selfie with a certain object; checking-in within a radius of a specified geolocation; or photographing an object at a given location.
author: CircuitBreakerCrew
